lead_paragraph: An Ethiopian opposition leader from a region hit by deadly anti-government protests last year pleaded not guilty in court on Friday, after prosecutors brought charges against him for inciting unrest.
snippet: An Ethiopian opposition leader from a region hit by deadly anti-government protests last year pleaded not guilty in court on Friday, after prosecutors brought charges against him for inciting unrest....

headline.main: Mourinho Says Rooney to Everton Talk Is 'Nonsense'
headline.print_headline: Mourinho Says Rooney to Everton Talk Is 'Nonsense'
